ISSUE.TITLE: Table editor column input field got blocked by suggested expression icon
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: # Bug report - [x] I confirm this is a bug with Supabase, not with my own application. - [x] I confirm I have searched the [Docs](https://docs.supabase.com), GitHub [Discussions](https://github.com/supabase/supabase/discussions), and [Discord](https://discord.supabase.com). ## Describe the bug In table editor, create new table, the table column input field for default value got blocked by suggested expression icon. ## To Reproduce Steps to reproduce the behavior, please provide code snippets or a repository: 1. Go to Table Editor 2. Click on New Table 3. Scroll down to the column settings 4. Notice under the default column, type a longer text until the suggested expression icon blocking the input text. ## Expected behavior The suggested expression icon inside the input field should not block the input text. ## Screenshots ![image](https://github.com/supabase/supabase/assets/15458805/02a544e2-5198-4b01-8b06-2850b21fd06b) ## System information - OS: Windows - Browser (if applies): Edge

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: docs: update Realtime docs about table names with spaces limitation (#17966)

COMMIT.MESSAGE: fix: table editor new column input field Issue #17969 * added padding to the right to prevent the icon blocking the input field
fix: table editor new column input field (#17970) Issue #17969 * added padding to the right to prevent the icon blocking the input field
